issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: WebAppProxyServlet should not redirect to RM page if AHS is enabled

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: YARN-3975 added the ability to redirect to the history server when an app fails to specify a tracking URL and the RM has since forgotten about the application.  However it redirects to /apps/<appid> instead of /app/<appid> which is the wrong destination page.
fields.summary: proxy redirect to history server uses wrong URL

comments.body: Simple patch. Just switching "apps" to "app" in the WebAppProxyServlet and in the associated test code.
